downloadTitle: Visual Studio .NET 2003 Service Pack 1 MFC71.DLL Security Update
downloadDescription: The security update MS07-012 / KB927696 for Visual Studio .NET 2003 Service Pack 1 shipped without the source file for MFC. This update provides the source file that corresponds to the security update.
detailsSection:
The security update MS07-012 / KB927696 for Visual Studio .NET 2003 Service Pack 1 shipped without the source file for MFC. This update provides the source file that corresponds to the security update.You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft.


Note: The only MFC source file that needs to be updated for this security update is oleui2.cpp, all other source files are updated to the latest version when you install Service Pack 1 for Visual Studio .NET 2003.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Change.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
additionalInformationSection: Please see the Knowledge Base Articles KB927696 for more information.
